page.title: 15Education
page.content: The local school in Croxton was closed when the Local Education Authority decided to transport the children to schools in Eccleshall and Stafford. The children attend First and Middle Schools in Eccleshall and go into Stafford for their Upper School Education. The closure of the village school in Croxton destroyed the focal point of this small community. Which has yet to replaced. There is great objection to the Authority's latest plan which suggests transporting the children to Stafford from the age of nine with the closure of one of the Eccleshall schools. Parents feel that the children will los the social benefits of education within the community.
